title: Grady's Kids
description: Are you a fan of old time westerns where the hero--or the villain--holds up a train at gunpoint? Grady Hughes loves those old movies, and when a train threatens, for the second time, to kill one of his valuable steers, he goes temporarily insane and lands himself in a world of trouble.He has to appear in court, undergo sentencing and deal with Fiona, the parole officer assigned to him. Fiona has never met anyone like Grady. He irritates her, but it's his kids who really get under her skin.What's she do with a modern day renegade and a trio of kids who capture her heart?
author: Bobby Hutchinson
